subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Ontario police cited a 26-year-old man for throwing a banana on the ice toward a black player, Wayne Simmonds of the Philadelphia Flyers, during an N.H.L. preseason game.
snippet: The Ontario police cited a 26-year-old man for throwing a banana on the ice toward a black player, Wayne Simmonds of the Philadelphia Flyers, during an N.H.L. preseason game.
